text: John A. Ryan was a Major League Baseball pitcher. He played for the Baltimore Monumentals of the Union Association in the 1884 season. He also played for the Chattanooga Lookouts in the Southern League in 1885. ==External links== *Baseball-Reference.com page Category:Baltimore Monumentals players Category:Baseball players from Michigan Category:19th-century baseball players Category:Chattanooga Lookouts players Category:Year of death missing Category:Year of birth missing
title: John Ryan (pitcher)
